Contacts

Join to the
DevOps culture

Where every process becomes faster, more convenient and safer for your business.

  • Saving resources

    Cost minimization without sacrificing quality.

  • Stability of operation

    Reliable solutions for your continuous operations.

  • Reliable support

    reliable solutions for your continuous operations.

Services

We provide a full range of services to achieve
your business goals with confidence in quality and safety.

  • Monitoring

    24/7 overview of infrastructure status Fault notifications

    Grafana / Loki / Prometheus

    Ensure the stability of your systems with our 24/7 monitoring solutions to prevent problems before they occur

  • CI/CD

    Pipeline development from A to Z

    MySQL / PostgreSQL / Redis / MongoDB / InfluxDB

    Accelerate development and testing processes with our CI/CD solutions, reducing time-to-market and improving quality.

  • Containerization

    Application containerization

    Docker / Nomad

    Improve application deployment and scalability with containerization best practices.

  • Infrastructure

    On-prem migration to the cloud Infrastructure as Code (IaC) - Terraform Infrastructure - AWS, Hetzner, Yandex.Cloud VPN servers Price optimization
    Create a reliable and scalable infrastructure with IaC tools and cloud services

  • Database

    Design, queries and potimization

    MySQL, PostgreSQL, Redis, MongoDB, InfluxDB

    We guarantee the efficiency and security of your databases by ensuring that they are designed, optimized and supported at all stages of operation.

  • Training and referral

    Mentoring Interviewing Managing the development team
    Enhance your teams' competencies through targeted training and professional mentoring in DevOps and modern IT practices.

Implementation process

  • Research

    Analyze your current infrastructure and needs, identify key areas for improvement and develop an implementation strategy

  • Realization

    Implement solutions that align with your strategy. This stage includes customizing systems, integrating the necessary tools and training your team

  • Support

    We provide continuous support and optimization of implemented solutions, ensuring their effectiveness and relevance in the long term

Technologies

  • Docker

    A containerization platform for packaging applications and their dependencies.

  • Ansible

    configuration management system written in the Python programming language

  • Go (Golang)

    A high-performance language, often used in DevOps tools and systems.

  • Terraform

    A tool for creating, modifying and versioning infrastructure securely and efficiently.

  • Kubernetes

    A system for automating the deployment, scaling, and management of containerized applications.

  • Git

    Version control system needed to manage changes to code.

  • Bash

    Widely used for server-side scripting and automating tasks in Unix/Linux.

  • SQL

    programming language for storing and processing information in a relational database.

  • Python

    Widely used for scripting, automation and web application development.

  • Java

    Popular for developing large-scale and highly loaded systems.

  • Node.js

    A software platform based on the V8 engine that transforms JavaScript from a highly specialized language into a general-purpose language.

  • JavaScript

    A multi-paradigm programming language.

Clients

Real-life examples demonstrating our expertise in implementing complex and highly loaded systems
Global-Media.info /
IPTV Video Broadcasting Service

Technologies:
Grafana, Prometheus, InfluxDB, Go, NodeJS, Telegram API, React, Flussonic API, Docker, Ansible

Global-Media.info / IPTV Video Broadcasting Service

GlobalMedia is an advanced IPTV video broadcasting service. We developed a system for monitoring all server metrics presented in a user-friendly interface, including business metrics for in-depth analysis and clear visualization. After careful analysis of the collected data, we migrated to more optimized servers and pooled resources, reducing costs by over 70%. In addition, developed a Telegram bot prototype to simplify and speed up access and payment processes for customers. Additional tools were implemented on Go for real-time validation of video streams and a prototype administrative panel for customer management. All applications were adapted to run in containers and run in Docker, increasing their efficiency and scalability.

disclose

Technologies:
Grafana, Prometheus, InfluxDB, Go, NodeJS, Telegram API, React, Flussonic API, Docker, Ansible
